==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ろ|しゅつ|けい|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Literally "exposed form". Compound of {{m|ja|露出|tr=roshutsu}} and {{m|ja|形|tr=-kei}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ろしゅつけい}}

# in Japanese morphology, a type of apophony found in word-final form caused by derivational suffixes

===See also===
* {{ja-r|被覆形|ひふくけい}}
